home.title: Drive in Style, Arrive in Comfort
home.subtitle: Experience luxury and reliability with our premium fleet. Book your perfect car in seconds via WhatsApp.
home.whatsappMessage: Hello! I would like to book a car rental.

premiumFleet.title: Premium Fleet
premiumFleet.desc: Luxury sedans, SUVs, and sports cars for every occasion.

easyBooking.title: Easy Booking
easyBooking.desc: Reserve your car in minutes through WhatsApp.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.desc: We are here whenever you need assistance.

about.title: Excellence in Every Journey
about.paragraph1: CarRentalAgo was founded with a simple mission: to provide premium car rental experiences that combine luxury, reliability, and seamless service. We believe that every trip deserves a vehicle that matches your standards.
about.paragraph2: Our fleet is carefully curated to include the finest sedans, SUVs, and sports cars. Whether you need a car for business, a special occasion, or a weekend getaway, we ensure your journey begins and ends in comfort.
about.paragraph3: We've integrated WhatsApp into our booking process so you can reserve your car quickly and easily—no complicated forms, just a simple conversation. Our team is always ready to assist you.

cars.title: Premium Vehicles for Every Occasion
cars.bookingMessage: Hi! I would like to book the {{carName}}.

contact.title: We'd Love to Hear From You
contact.message: Hello! I have a question about CarRentalAgo.

location.title: Our Location
location.subtitle: Visit our office to pick up your rental car
